plot: Sally gets addicted to possessing a live woman, Josh searches for a cure as Nora explores her connection to her wolf, Aidan is called to task for not yet ridding Boston of the orphan vampires.

In agony, desperately seeking a dodgy alternative for his safe hospital blood supply, Aidan finds his 1930s nightmare revived with Suren and his sexually insatiable ex-protégé Henry, whom he finds alive in hiding. Despite his initial disgusted refusal, Josh accepts rich Connor and Brynn McLean's help to research how the werewolf condition might be medically controlled independently of the lunar cycle.—KGF Vissers
